events.header: The mother sends pigs to seek fortune.
events.subheader: There was a family of pigs whose mother sends her 3 children off to seek their fortunes.

events.header: The first pigs builds a house of straw.
events.subheader: The first pig finds a man who sells straw. He builds a house with the straw the man gave him.

events.header: The wolves blows down the house of the first pig and eats him.
events.subheader: The wolf comes to the house of the first pig. He threatens to blow the house down, blows it down, and eats the pig.

events.header: The second pig builds a house of sticks.
events.subheader: The second pig finds a man who sells sticks. He builds a house with the sticks the man gave him.

events.header: The wolves blows down the house of the second pig and eats him.
events.subheader: The wolf comes to the house of the second pig. He threatens to blow the house down, blows it down, and eats the pig.

events.header: The third pig builds a house of bricks.
events.subheader: The third pig finds a man who sells sticks. He builds a house with the sticks the man gave him.

events.header: Since the wolf cannot blow down the house of the third pig, he enters the chimney and is boiled.
events.subheader: The wolf comes to the house of the third pig. He threatens to blow the house down. He is unable to blow it down. In anger, he goes down the chimney and is boiled by the pig.
